DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate D1 Receptor Occupancy ( RO ) follow single dose PF-06412562 In healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate D1 Receptor Occupancy ( RO ) Following Single Dose PF-06412562 In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Male Volunteers Evidence history clinically significant hepatic , renal , cardiovascular , endocrine , hematologic , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neurologic , oncologic , psychiatric , allergic disease Any condition possibly affect drug absorption A positive urine drug screen
